title: BTS: Business Casual’s Relaunch
description:
Today, we’re taking you behind the scenes to meet the new audio team behind Business Casual’s relaunch. We’re also filling you in about some exciting new changes to come this fall.
If you want to hear from a specific guest or about a certain industry, let us know! Reach out via email at businesscasual@morningbrew.com or DM @bizcasualpod.

content:encoded:
Today, we’re taking you behind the scenes to meet the new audio team behind Business Casual’s relaunch. We’re also filling you in about some exciting new changes to come this fall.

If you want to hear from a specific guest or about a certain industry, let us know! Reach out via email at businesscasual@morningbrew.com or DM @bizcasualpod.
